definitions.definition: A biguanide derivative , C 4 H 11 N 5 , used, now chiefly as the hydrochloride , as an oral hypoglycemic agent in the treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus ; 1,1- dimethyl biguanide .

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) A biguanide derivative , C 4 H 11 N 5 , used, now chiefly as the hydrochloride , as an oral hypoglycemic agent in the treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus ; 1,1- dimethyl biguanide .
